definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: This was key to managing the investors and opening more pockets of finance.
sentences.chinese: 這就是管理投資者和打開更多金主腰包的關鍵。

sentences.english: The materialistic pattern of life is one in which money predominates over everything.
sentences.chinese: 真正的拜金主義生活方式是讓金錢凌駕於一切之上。

sentences.english: She's capable of tapping into many wealthy investors.
sentences.chinese: 她有辦法和許多金主的投資者連上線。

sentences.english: But finding new lenders after default is not easy.
sentences.chinese: 但希臘違約之後，將很難找到新的金主。

sentences.english: The trade and the mammonism seriously corrodes the society lives each stratification plane.
sentences.chinese: 商業化及拜金主義嚴重侵蝕着社會生活各個層面。

sentences.english: I don't know somebody who are mammonism .
sentences.chinese: 我不理解那些拜金主義的人。

sentences.english: There has been undesirable trend in recent years towards the worship of money.
sentences.chinese: 近年來出現了對社會有害的拜金主義傾向。

sentences.english: The money-oriented people are cold and indifferent to each other.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主義的人是冷和冷漠。

sentences.english: The money-oriented people are cold and indifferent to each other.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主義使人際關係冷漠了。

sentences.english: “No idol, ” he said, “is more debasing than the worship of money.”
sentences.chinese: 沒有信仰比拜金主義更可恥。

sentences.english: He will take every last penny, then he will move on to the next big pay day.
sentences.chinese: 他會帶走最後一分錢，然後去找下一個大金主。

sentences.english: Money worship is the extreme presentation of the secular utility values.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主義是世俗功利價值觀的極端形式。

sentences.english: They also make themselves more beholden to campaign donors, corrupting government.
sentences.chinese: 他們當然會對金主們感恩戴德，然後腐化政府。

sentences.english: In the money-oriented society, some people are becoming more and more impersonal.
sentences.chinese: 在拜金主義的社會，有些人越來越沒有人情味的。

definition: adoptive father (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
a favorite of sb in power/a celebrity/American Indian
big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to burn joss paper/(fig.) to flush money down the toilet
to boost support or interest/to campaign/to promote
to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
the people one depends upon for one's livelihood/one's bread and butter
